title: Ginger beef and noodle soup
ingredients: ['100g (4 oz) rice noodles', '1.4L (2 3/8 pints) cold water', '2 (500g) containers beef stock', '1 knob fresh root ginger, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 red chilli, chopped', '225g (8 oz) beef topside, sliced very thin', 'good handful fresh basil leaves', 'handful fresh chopped coriander', '100g (4 oz) beansprouts', '4 spring onions, thinly sliced', '4 wedges lime', 'hot pepper sauce (optional)', 'oyster sauce (optional)']
